arch.ether

Class Ether<T>

  • arch.ether.Ether<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataObservable<T>, IDataPublisher<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EtherObservable

    public class Ether<T>
implements IDataPublisher<T>, IDataObservable<T>

    Ether is a PubSub data bus where data can be published and subscribed.

    See Also:
    Ether.Companion.publisherOf, Ether.Companion.subscriberOf
